meanings.definition: Existing in thought or as an idea but not having a physical or concrete existence.
meanings.sent1: The abstractest concept in the story was the idea of friendship.
meanings.sent2: Her abstractest painting was a swirl of colors that seemed to have no form.
meanings.sent3: The abstractest notion in the class was that unicorns could be real.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an abstractest canvas, full of colors waiting to be brought to life.
meanings.sent5: The abstractest dream she had was of flying without wings.

meanings.sent1: The abstractest thoughts often lead to the most creative ideas.

meanings.sent3: It was the abstractest decision to wear mismatched socks to the formal event.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like the abstractest melodies, floating in the air with no clear destination.
meanings.sent5: The abstractest feeling he experienced was that of pure joy without any reason.
